snippet: The Treasury Department has announced plans to sell $5 billion worth of American International Group stock, as the insurer slowly recovers from the depths of the financial crisis.
abstract: The Treasury Department has announced plans to sell $5 billion worth of American International Group stock, as the insurer slowly recovers from the depths of the financial crisis.

headline.main: Treasury to Sell A.I.G. Shares at $30.50 Apiece
